lines.text: How much English does this doll understand?
Pretty soon I'll have to spell out things to you.

[to his wife who has fainted at the table]
What's the matter? Hey, Baby!

[Sarcastically]
Well I never had a dame that slept during dinner.

[after he finds out she's pregnant]
You're happy, Joe?
Happy? Why, I'm so happy I'd like to go up and bust someone in the nose!
I ain't goin' to no Federal pen! There isn't one big enough to hold Joe Krozac!

[as he is being led away by police]
Hello, joe. I'll see you in ten years, and I'll have a little valentine for you when you get out.
Gee, i hope they sends us to Levensworth.
So I can be near me pop. Boy, I'll bet he'll be glad to see me...
